column1: #: description: Ratio D$^{+}$/D$^{0}$ in semicentral Pb-Pb collisions at $\sqrt{s_\mathrm{NN}}=5.02$ TeV
column2: in |y|<0.5 and as a function of $p_\mathrm{T}$. Statistical (bars) and systematic (boxes) uncertainties are shown. Branching ratio of D$^0$ --> K$\pi$ = 0.0395 Branching ratio of D$^+$ --> K$\pi\pi$ = 0.0938
